description.value:
A holy weapon commands powerful celestial energy. Strikes made with it gain the holy trait and deal an extra 1d4 spirit damage, or an extra 2d4 against an unholy target. If you are unholy, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate—Holy Healing R (concentrate, healing, vitality)

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically succeed at a Strike against an unholy creature with the weapon

Effect You regain HP equal to double the unholy creature’s level.

Craft Requirements You are holy.
